mean_en: a usually rented room or set of rooms that is part of a building and is used as a place to live
word_etyma: apart分开的 + ment名词后缀 → 楼房分开住的地方 → apartment （美）一套公寓房间
deformation_desc: 其实apartment一般是指X室X厅的公寓，一栋房子里可以有多个apartment
sentence: We have rented an apartment - now to buy some furniture.
sentence_trans: 我们租了一套公寓，现在该去买些家具了。
